amendment.description: to express the sense of the Senate concerning child nutrition funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2844 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2844 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2668-2669; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2668-2669) to express the sense of the Senate concerning child nutrition funding.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2844 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Dole.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2844 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
